plot: An all day chase ensues after the boyfriend of a girl whose bag gets snatched in an East Village café chases the Snatcher clear across NYC.
title: The Snatcher
plot_es: An all day chase ensues after the boyfriend of a girl whose bag gets snatched in an East Village café chases the Snatcher clear across NYC.
plot_en: An all day chase ensues after the boyfriend of a girl whose bag gets snatched in an East Village café chases the Snatcher clear across NYC.
